page.shortlink: api objects security object delete role method

argument.name: RoleName
argument.description: The name of the role to be deleted.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if role is deleted; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.DeleteRole() removes a role. A role must not have any users associated with it in order for it to be deleted. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
